conversations.description: Employee uploads a hotel receipt, the AI extracts data, checks nightly rate limit, and notifies the employee of a minor over‑age.
Finance manager requests a compliance report for all expenses submitted last month across the company.
Travel auditor compares a flight receipt against the policy’s maximum fare class and flags a business‑class upgrade.
User queries why a taxi expense was rejected, and the assistant explains the missing receipt field.
HR asks the AI to pull the travel policy for a newly acquired subsidiary and summarize key limits.
Employee submits a meal receipt without a date; the AI requests the missing information before evaluation.
Finance team sets up an automatic notification for any expense exceeding the per‑diem allowance.
Audit leads requests a batch evaluation of all expenses for a specific project, receiving a markdown summary.
Employee uploads a foreign‑currency receipt; the AI converts amounts using the policy’s exchange rate rules.
Travel coordinator asks the AI to retrieve the policy for a client‑specific contract and highlight any exceptions.
User wonders if a conference registration fee is covered; the AI checks policy categories and returns a compliance verdict.
Finance analyst runs a query for all expenses missing receipt images and receives a list to follow up.
Employee requests a corrected expense entry after the AI suggests a typo in the merchant name.
Manager wants to know the total number of policy violations in Q1 and receives a concise statistical report.
Travel auditor asks the AI to re‑evaluate a previously flagged expense after policy updates were applied.
User uploads multiple receipts at once; the AI processes each, evaluates compliance, and returns a combined report.
Finance department sets a rule to auto‑approve expenses under $25 and the AI confirms the rule works for a new claim.
Employee asks why a parking fee was declined; the AI shows the policy requires a separate receipt for parking.
Audit supervisor requests a drill‑down view of all violations by expense type for the last fiscal year.
User wants to know the company’s preferred airline; the AI fetches policy and lists allowed carriers.
Travel manager queries the AI for the most common compliance issues across departments.
Employee submits a receipt with an illegible date; the AI uses OCR confidence scores and asks for clarification.
Finance lead asks the AI to generate a quarterly compliance heat map based on evaluation results.
User asks the AI to draft an email to the employee explaining why their expense was adjusted.
Audit team wants to compare expense patterns before and after a policy change; the AI prepares side‑by‑side summaries.
Employee uploads a car rental receipt; the AI checks mileage limits and alerts to an excess mileage charge.
Finance asks the AI to list all expenses that lack required receipt fields according to the policy.
Travel coordinator requests a quick glance at the top three highest‑value expenses for the week.
User wants to know if a late‑night meal is allowed; the AI references policy time windows and returns a decision.
Auditor asks the AI to flag any expenses submitted after the travel end date.
Employee asks for a step‑by‑step guide to submit a new expense, and the AI walks through the process.
Finance manager requests a downloadable CSV of all compliance violations for integration with BI tools.
User uploads a receipt with a non‑USD currency; the AI checks policy conversion limits before approval.
Audit lead queries the AI for an explanation of how the AI calculates per‑diem totals.
Employee receives a notification about a missing receipt image and is prompted to upload it.
Travel policy is updated to allow higher hotel rates in a specific city; the AI demonstrates the new limit.
Finance team wants an aggregated view of total violations cost savings if all were corrected.
User asks if a ride‑share expense can be split across multiple days; the AI checks policy rules.
Auditor initiates a re‑audit of a particular employee’s expenses for the past six months.
Employee requests a summary of all approved expenses for a business trip to present to their manager.
Finance analyst asks the AI to highlight any expenses that exceed the policy’s cap on entertainment costs.
Travel coordinator uploads a receipt with multiple line items; the AI parses each and evaluates them individually.
Manager asks the AI to auto‑notify finance when an expense exceeds the threshold for manual review.
User wants to know the policy’s requirement for itemizing meals; the AI returns the exact language.
Auditor requests a compliance heat map filtered by geographic region.
Finance team sets up a weekly digest of new policy violations, and the AI schedules the notifications.
Employee asks why a baggage fee was flagged; the AI shows that the policy excludes ancillary airline fees.
Travel manager queries the AI for the top five vendors with the most compliant expenses.
User asks the AI to simulate the compliance outcome for a hypothetical expense before submitting it.
Finance lead wants a markdown report summarizing all expense violations for an upcoming board meeting.
Auditor requests the AI to export all expense records that lack a policy reference ID.
Employee wonders if an early‑check‑in fee is reimbursable; the AI checks policy allowances and responds.
Travel coordinator asks the AI to flag any expenses submitted after the fiscal quarter end date.
